sub_title: Senior Lecturer  / Researcher at Tilburg University
summary:
Research interests are in strategic management and inter-organizational relationships field. I build on a combination of cognitive and network approaches to strategy and such relationships. Also, how can we use gaming/simulation and serious games to study these?

Currently focusing on micro-foundations of strategy, strategic decision making, open strategy, and causes and consequences of inter-organizational collaboration and inter-organizational tie dissolution.

I am one of the convenors of the standing track Microfoundations of Strategy: Dynamic Capabilities and Knowledge Mechanisms at EURAM (European Academy of Management) and one of the representatives-at-large of the Strategy Process Interest Group of SMS (Strategic Management Society).

profile_positions.location: Capelle aan den IJssel, Zuid-Holland, Nederland
profile_positions.title: Senior consulent

profile_positions.description:
Teaching in bachelor's and master's programs on Organisation Studies programs and in bachelor programs in Sociology, Human Resource Management, Leisure Studies and Liberal Arts programs. This includes regular teaching in courses as well as thesis supervision.

Conducting research on inter-organizational networks, inter-organizational collaboration, strategic decision making and cognitive complexity of decision makers.
profile_positions.title: Senior Lecturer/Researcher

profile_positions.description:
Link to bachelor program Organisatiewetenschappen (Dutch): https://www.tilburguniversity.edu/nl/onderwijs/bacheloropleidingen/organisatiewetenschappen/

Link to master program Organization Studies (English): https://www.tilburguniversity.edu/education/masters-programmes/organization-studies/
profile_positions.title: Academic Director Organization Studies

profile_positions.description: In this role I managed HR planning and financial aspects in collaboration with the Head of Department. Next to this, I also coordinated the bachelor program in collaboration with the academic director Organization Studies. From November 2017 onwards my role in the board is that of Academic Director in Organization Studies,
profile_positions.title: Board member Department of Organisation Studies

profile_positions.description: Member of the advisory group (klankbordgroep) on the RAAK project iXpeditie Maatwerk (i.e., Organizing Personalized Learning). Advice is provided on aspects of serious gaming in relation to the target group as well as evaluating the game design.
profile_positions.title: Advisor

profile_positions.description: Coaching and developing Serious Game Designs of master students in Organization Studies to develop ways for organizing personalized learning at primary school levels. . iXperium at the Hogeschool Arnhem & Nijmegen was the 'client', and the coaching took place in collaboration with Fresh Forces.
profile_positions.title: Lecturer/Coach

profile_positions.description: Coaching and developing Serious Game Designs of master students in Organization Studies to develop collaboration and entrepreneurial initiatives based on the Economic Impulse Agenda of the Municipality of Tilburg. The Municipality of Tilburg was the 'client', and the coaching took place in collaboration with Fresh Forces.
profile_positions.title: Lecturer/Coach

profile_positions.description: Coaching and developing Serious Game Designs of master students in Organization Studies to combat child exploitation.  Terre des Hommes the Netherlands was the 'client', and the coaching took place in collaboration with Fresh Forces. The game designs served future exploration.
profile_positions.title: Lecturer/Coach

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the maintenance and revision of the bachelor educational program Organisation Studies.
profile_positions.title: Educational Director

profile_positions.description: Internship with European Sales Office. Research aimed at differences between sales offices in four countries.
